fields.label: Enable Lightbox for Video Post
fields.description: Enable Lightbox for Video Post in archives

fields.label: Enable Screenshots Preview for Video Post
fields.description: Enable Screenshots Preview for Video Post in archives

fields.label: Player Background
fields.description: Select default background for video player

fields.label: Video Header
fields.description: Choose to display Thumbnail Image or Video Player when users visit single post. You can override this setting in each post

fields.label: Animated Icon
fields.description: Toggle Animated Version of Icon Play

fields.label: Auto Fetch Data

select.text: Fetch Video Tags (only work with Vimeo and Dailymotion)
Fetch Video Duration, Views, Likes, Comments count

fields.description: This is an admin feature when adding new video post. Select which data to auto-fetch from video network (support YouTube, Vimeo and Dailymotion) when entering video URL

fields.label: Google API Key
fields.description: Fill your Google API key to fetch data from Youtube. Check this guide: https://developers.google.com/youtube/v3/getting-started

fields.label: Use Video Data from Network
fields.description: Add Video Data (views, likes, dislikes) from network (only support YouTube, Vimeo, Dailymotion) to site’s data. Please note that these values will be used for any queries such as Order By

fields.label: Use Video Comment Count from Network
fields.description: Add Video Comment Count from network (only support YouTube, Vimeo, Dailymotion) to site’s data. Please note that these values will be used for any queries such as Order By

fields.label: Use JW Player Settings
fields.description: Use JW Player Settings instead of default VideoPro video settings

fields.label: Delay before auto-next
fields.description: Number of seconds to wait before auto-next videos. By default, it will wait 1 second before playing next

fields.label: Next Videos by
fields.description: Choose how to navigate videos

fields.label: Next Videos only
fields.description: Choose to navigate through video posts only, or other posts

fields.label: Next Videos order
fields.description: Choose how to load next videos

fields.label: Auto Next button for Visitors
fields.description: Only avaiable for YouTube, Vimeo and Dailymotion videos

fields.label: Video Player Light On/Off
fields.description: Enable the Light On/Off button for Video Player

fields.label: Spam Flag
fields.description: Enable Spam Flag to allow users to report broken videos.

fields.label: Spam Flag - Contact Form 7 ID
fields.description: ID of a Contact Form 7 to receive video report. Requires Contact Form 7 plugin. (use either Contact Form 7 or GravityForms)

fields.label: Spam Flag - GravityForms ID
fields.description: ID of a Gravity Form to receive video report. Requires GravityForms plugin. (use either Contact Form 7 or GravityForms)

fields.label: Video Toolbar - "WTI Like" button
fields.description: Enable "WTI Like" button in the video toolbar. Require "WTI Like Post" plugin installed

fields.label: Video Toolbar - "Sharing" button
fields.description: Enable "Sharing" button in the video toolbar. Social Networks are configurable in Theme Options

fields.label: Video Toolbar - "Facebook Like" button
fields.description: Enable "Facebook Like" button in the video toolbar

fields.label: Video Toolbar - "Watch Later" button
fields.description: Enable "Watch Later" button in the video toolbar and other places

fields.label: Video Toolbar - "Google+" button
fields.description: Enable "Google+" button in the video toolbar

fields.label: Video Toolbar - "More Videos" button
fields.description: Show "More Videos" option

fields.label: "More Videos" by
fields.description: Select condition for "More Videos"

fields.label: "More Videos" - custom taxonomy
fields.description: Enter name of Custom Taxonomy to query more videos. Videos having same taxonomies will be queries

fields.label: Hide About Author
fields.description: Hide "About Author" box for video posts

fields.label: Video Screenshots
fields.description: Enable "Video Screenshot" feature

fields.label: Video Floating
fields.description: Enable "Video Floating" feature. Video Player will stick to the page view when users scroll the page

fields.label: Video Floating - Position
fields.description: Choose position of the sticky Video Player

fields.label: Show "More Content"
fields.description: Show/Hide "More Content" button. This button is used to shrink long content in posts

fields.label: Share video on facebook:
fields.description: Action when a shared Video Post is clicked on Facebook

fields.label: Use Video Secure URL
fields.description: Add <og:video:secure_url> metadata to header

fields.label: Video On-Page Marked Up HTML
fields.description: Print out marked-up HTML for VideoObject. This helps Google to display video information in the results page

fields.label: Related videos
fields.description: Display related videos at the end of the video

fields.label: Use HTML5 player
fields.description: Use HTML5 player to play YouTube videos

fields.label: Force using Embed Code
fields.description: When using Embed Code, some features cannot work such as "Auto Next Videos"

fields.label: Force using JWPlayer 7
fields.description: Force using JWPlayer 7 for YouTube videos

fields.label: Enable Video Series
fields.description: Enable Video Series feature

fields.label: Video Series Slug
fields.description: Change Video Series slug. Remember to save the permalink settings again in Settings > Permalinks

fields.label: Video Series Order 1
fields.description: Choose order of videos in Single Series page

fields.label: Video Series Order 2
fields.description: Choose order of videos in "Episodes" listing in single Video page

fields.label: Play All From
fields.description: Which video to play first when clicking on "Play All" videos in series

fields.label: Enable
fields.description: Enable Front-end Post Submission feature

fields.label: Login Required
fields.description: Select whether only logged-in users can submit or not

fields.label: Submit Button - Label
fields.description: Enter text you want to show

fields.label: Auto-Fetch Data
fields.description: Auto-fetch data for known video sources (YouTube, Vimeo, Dailymotion)

fields.label: Post Title Prefix
fields.description: Add a prefix to post title so you know which one is submitted via front-end

fields.label: Exclude Category from Categories List
fields.description: Enter IDs of categories that you don't want to be displayed in category checkboxes list (ex: "1,68,86")

fields.label: Categories Appearance
fields.description: To limit user to choose one category only

fields.label: Limit number of tags that users can enter
fields.description: Use 0 for unlimited

fields.label: Exclude Channels from Channels List
fields.description: Enter IDs of channels that you don't want to be displayed in channel checkboxes list (ex: "1,68,86")

fields.label: Channels Appearance
fields.description: To limit user to choose one channel only

fields.label: Owner's Channel Only
fields.description: Only list Channels of which the current logged-in user is owner. This option should be used only when 'Login Required' option is set to 'Yes'

fields.label: Exclude Playlists from Playlists List
fields.description: Enter IDs of playlists that you don't want to be displayed in playlist checkboxes list (ex: "1,68,86")

fields.label: Playlists Appearance
fields.description: To limit user to choose one playlist only

fields.label: Owner's Playlist Only
fields.description: Only list Playlists of which the current logged-in user is owner. This option should be used only when 'Login Required' option is set to 'Yes'

fields.label: Notification
fields.description: Send notification email to user when post is published

fields.label: Fix Popup Height
fields.description: Fix Submission Popup Height and make it scrollable

fields.label: Set Popup Height
fields.description: Enter limit height of Submission Popup, in pixels (with "px" at the end)

fields.label: Close Modal
fields.description: Close Popup Forms when clicking outside the content

fields.label: Enable Subscription
fields.description: Enable Author Subscription feature

fields.label: Action

select.text: Require Logging In. Use default WordPress Login page
Require Logging In. Use custom Login URL

fields.description: Choose action for "Subscribe Button". This is the action to subscribe Authors. For Channel Subscription, go to "Video Channels" settings

fields.label: Custom URL
fields.description: Enter custom Login URL if users need to login

fields.label: Popup Content
fields.description: Enter HTML content for the Login Popup. Using shortcode is possible
